content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- Check out the distinct values
-- SELECT DISTINCT [Title] FROM [ext].[Catalog]

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INT;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(MovieCategorySK), 0) FROM [dbo].[DimMovies]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimMovies] (
	[MovieSK],
	[MovieID],
    [MovieTitle],
    [MovieCategorySK],
    [MovieRatingSK],
    [MovieRunTimeMin]
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.Title) AS MovieSK,
		ExternalTable.GLobalMovieID AS MovieID,
		ExternalTable.Title AS MovieTitle,
		ExternalTable.MovieCategorySK AS MovieCategorySK,
		ExternalTable.MovieRatingSK AS MovieRatingSK,
		ExternalTable.RuntimeMinutes AS MovieRunTimeMin
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT Title,
			gen.MovieCategorySK,
			rat.MovieRatingSK,
			RuntimeMinutes,
			MAX(GlobalMovieID) AS GLobalMovieID
		FROM
			[ext].[Catalog] cat
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimCategories] gen
			ON (cat.Genre = gen.MovieCategoryDescription)
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimRatings] rat
			ON CASE
				WHEN cat.Rating = 'PG=13' AND ('PG-13' = rat.MovieRatingDescription) THEN 1
				WHEN cat.Rating = rat.MovieRatingDescription THEN 1
				ELSE 0
				END = 1
		GROUP BY
			Title,
			gen.MovieCategorySK,
			rat.MovieRatingSK,
			RuntimeMinutes
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.MovieTitle NOT IN (SELECT MovieTitle FROM [dbo].[DimMovies])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimMovies]


SELECT
	GlobalCustomerID,
	LastName,
	FIrstName,
	AddressLine1,
	CASE 
		WHEN AddressLine2 = 'NULL' THEN NULL
		ELSE AddressLine2
	END AS AddressLine2,
--	City,
--	State,
--	ZipCode,
--	PhoneNumber,
	dat.UpdatedDate AS RecordStartDate
FROM
	[ext].[customers] cust
CROSS APPLY (
	SELECT TOP 1
		UpdatedDate
	FROM
		[ext].[customers]
	WHERE LastName = cust.Lastname
	AND FirstName = cust.FirstName
	AND AddressLine1 = cust.AddressLine1
	AND City = cust.City
	ORDER BY UpdatedDate DESC
) dat
ORDER BY LastName, FirstName
